reviewText: I have used it to teach French to very young children It is both educational & entertaining Kids like to watch it over & over again

the French learning isn't the problem its the awful off key singing that can hurt your child natural talented ear. im glad I didn't have this as a child because I was born with perfect pitch and this would have messed it up in my early stages of life. think about this before you buy it for your innocent children

I have used the Muzzy series in Spanish & wanted to have the French also. (I teach both languages.)  This set is amazing because it has all the support materials!

Product arrived quickly and in excellent condition!
